name: Zuppler
tag_list: online-ordering, food-order, restaurants, restaurant, online-order, restaurant-portal
overview:
Zuppler provides online food ordering service to restaurants. Zuppler’s online ordering technology integrates directly with restaurant’s website and is also available via the the Zuppler Network. User’s can order food for pickup or delivery from the restaurant’s own website or via various dining guides and portals (including Zuppler.com).

Restaurant’s can integrate online ordering directly on their website using Zuppler API’s. Users will remain on the restaurant website while ordering online and will NOT be redirected to an external website. This increases the traffic and the page rank for the restaurant website and converts the website into a revenue generating avenue.

Zuppler network includes various online dining guides and portals. Websites on the Zuppler Network provide their users the ability to order online directly from their site using Zuppler’s online ordering technology. The restaurant menu’s are customized to match the look and feel of the network website.

Website and Wordpress developers can leverage Zuppler’s online ordering plugin to provide their restaurant clients advanced features including online ordering, discounts, coupons, catering, group ordering etc.

Zuppler also integrates online ordering directly on restaurant’s Facebook pages and enables their fans to order online directly from Facebook.

Zuppler’s online ordering technology is available and is optimized for all smart phone devices, iPads and other tablets. By using Zuppler’s online ordering technology, mobile ordering is automatically enabled for restaurant websites, network portals and for website developers.

The 24/7 customer service and the “no order left behind” policy ensures that every order placed via the restaurant website and any of the Zuppler’s network are processed and completed in a timely manner. Users can use the “Live Order Tracking” feature to monitor the progress and status of their order while they are processed.

Zuppler partners with independent restaurants, small and large restaurant chains and food trucks. Zuppler’s order throttling feature enables restaurants to scale up and down dynamically and helps manage the order volume and enables restaurants to scale at a pace they are comfortable with.
